metadata.name: User Added To Admin Group Via Sysadminctl
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to create and add an account to the admin group via "sysadminctl"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sysadminctl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -adduser ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -admin ')))

output.summary: Detects attempts to create and add an account to the admin group via "sysadminctl"

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/master/atomics/T1078.003/T1078.003.md#atomic-test-3---create-local-account-with-admin-privileges-using-sysadminctl-utility---macos, https://ss64.com/osx/sysadminctl.html
